guru.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, and gives advice to other people
guru.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a Hindu religious teacher or leader
guru.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: someone who knows a lot about fashion, managing businesses etc, whom people consider to be a leader in their area and whom they go to for advice
guru.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Management gurus have looked at world-class firms in the hope of finding the magic formula for success.
